title: [Feature Request] BMM for sparse tensors
body_html:
Hi,

would it be possible to extend batch matrix multiplication to sparse tensors? If not, would it be feasible to add basic reshaping ops to sparse tensors such as view or expand ? This way, maybe there could be a workaround using torch.mm with some tensor reshaping.

Many Thanks,
Lucas

body:
Hi, 

would it be possible to extend batch matrix multiplication to sparse tensors? If not, would it be feasible to add basic reshaping ops to sparse tensors such as view or expand ? This way, maybe there could be a workaround using torch.mm  with some tensor reshaping. 

Many Thanks, 
Lucas
